cartocss: #layer { polygon-fill: #0d6603; polygon-opacity: 0.0; } #layer::outline { line-width: 1; line-color: #FFFFFF; line-opacity: 0.5; } #layer::labels [zoom > 3]{ text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-size: 10; text-fill: #FFFFFF; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-character-spacing: 1.0; text-halo-radius: 1; text-halo-fill: #6F808D; text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; } #layer::labels [zoom > 5]{ text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-size: 12; text-fill: #FFFFFF; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-character-spacing: 1.0; text-halo-radius: 1; text-halo-fill: #6F808D; text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; } #layer::labels [zoom > 8]{ text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-size: 13; text-fill: #FFFFFF; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-character-spacing: 1.0; text-halo-radius: 1; text-halo-fill: #6F808D; text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; }
